content: lion brand pattern # 30144-c *chs-oneskeinhatscarf pdf* skill level beginner level 1 homespun® article #790 2 balls *either the hat or the scarf can be made of a single skein * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm hat is worked flat in double_crochet u s sew seam to finish scarf is worked in double_crochet to desired length see 30144-k one-skein hat and scarf knit 1 for the knit version *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/one-skein-hat-and-scarf-knit
